item.description:
Join us for a fun night of salsa lessons and dancing. All levels are welcome. The group is divided into the beginner lesson and an intermediate lesson. The teachers are good and easy to follow. Look forward to seeing you there!

 

Saturday Night Salsa is Boston's biggest salsa party on Saturdays featuring salsa dancing and lessons with Salsa y Control, regular performances, and an amazing venue filled with 200+ welcoming salsa dancers. Saturday Night Salsa has it all, including: a 5400 square foot ballroom, a raised performance stage, club lighting and sound, a reasonably priced full bar ($4-5 beer, $5-7 mixed drink, etc), an inexpensive parking garage next door, and public transport on Mass Ave. (Red Line, Buses 1, 64 etc.) one block away! 

 

Admission is $12 (cash only) and the bar is cash only too.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) upstairs inside event entrance, near payment table. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.why: Join us for a fun night of Salsa lessons and dancing at the Havana Club in Central Square, Cambridge. Lesson and dancing is only $12. This place is a lot of fun and the lessons are really good!
item.name: Salsa Lesson and Dancing, Havana Club, Cambridge
